segments.text: I watch the woman wipe the plate, her expression one of peaceful concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she’s missing so much happening around her, it’s almost painful to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she not hear the splashing water? Or is she just too caught up in her routine?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is practically flying toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to tipping backward, and I hold my breath, waiting for a disaster to strike.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager expression adds to the chaos, her arm extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s delightful and terrifying all at once, this dance of innocence and risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
